name: SPEC_HORMONE_THERAPY_TEXT
description: This table contains information about the hormone therapy for the patient as free text.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HORMONE_THERAPY_TEXT
columns.description: The hormone therapy for the patient as free text.
